message.body: Hey! I'll be in Philly on 12/29 â€“ will you be in town?
So sad we didn't see each other last time I was in town for Julie's bday :/
Yes!!! Definitely! And yes so sad :( I felt awful that I forgot her bday too
I totally forgot that that was the event, or I would have texted her at least
I was so overwhelmed and stressed w my show and was a bad friend ::
Aw, I'm sure she understands. How was the show??
And yay can't wait to see you!
Right now I don't have any firm plans that day after lunch.
Perfect! See you then! Show was ok. I'll tell you all about it when I see you!
